get.description:
Search and retrieve Wallet Passes with optional filtering and pagination.

**Features:**
- Search passes by name using keyword query (case-insensitive)
- Filter by pass status (Draft, Published)
- Filter by specific pass ID or pass name
- Pagination support with cursor-based navigation
- Option to include pass assets (images) in response
- Option to return summary-only information

**Pagination:**
- Use `cursor` parameter for next page navigation
- `limit` controls page size (default: 20, max: 20)
- Response includes `items` array, `cursor`, and `hasMore` fields

parameters.name: x-workspace-id
parameters.description: Workspace ID to perform the operation in. If not provided, system will use the first one assigned to the user

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search keyword to filter passes by name (case-insensitive)

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor for fetching the next set of results. Use the 'cursor' value from the previous response.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of passes to return per page (1-20, max 20)

parameters.name: includePassAssets
parameters.description: Include pass asset URLs (images) in the response

parameters.name: summary
parameters.description: Return only basic pass information (summary mode)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Filter by specific pass ID

parameters.name: passName
parameters.description: Exact search by pass name (case-sensitive)

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter passes by status. Multiple values allowed.

passMetadata.description: Exclusive VIP membership pass with premium benefits

post.description: Create a new wallet pass for both Apple and Google platforms.

parameters.name: x-workspace-id
parameters.description: Workspace ID to perform the operation in. If not provided, system will use the first one assigned to the user

requestBody.description: Wallet pass creation data including metadata, fields, and uploaded asset references

passMetadata.description: Exclusive VIP membership pass with premium benefits
Exclusive VIP membership pass with premium benefits

get.summary: Search and filter wallet pass notifications
get.description:
Search and retrieve wallet pass notifications with optional filtering and pagination.

**Features:**
- Search notifications by name using keyword query (case-insensitive)
- Filter by notification status (Draft, Scheduled, Processing, Published, Failed)
- Filter by specific wallet pass serial numbers
- Pagination support with cursor-based navigation
- Option to include pass template data in response
- Option to include link click statistics

**Pagination:**
- Use `cursor` parameter for next page navigation
- `limit` controls page size (default: 20, max: 20)
- Response includes `items` array, `cursor`, and `hasMore` fields

**Status Values:**
- `Draft`: Notification created but not yet ready for delivery
- `Scheduled`: Notification scheduled for future delivery (processed every 15 minutes)
- `Processing`: Notification currently being sent or sent immediately upon creation
- `Published`: Notification successfully delivered to all recipients
- `Failed`: Notification delivery failed due to errors

parameters.name: x-workspace-id
parameters.description: Workspace ID to perform the operation in. If not provided, system will use the first one assigned to the user

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search keyword to filter notifications by name (case-insensitive)

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor for fetching the next set of results. Use the 'cursor' value from the previous response.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of notifications to return per page (1-20, max 20)

parameters.name: passSerialNumber
parameters.description: Filter by specific wallet pass serial numbers

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter notifications by status. Multiple values allowed.

Success Response.summary: Paginated list of wallet pass notifications

items.notificationMessage: Your VIP membership benefits have been updated! Check out the new exclusive offers.
Limited time offer! Get 20% off your next purchase with your VIP membership.

post.summary: Create a notification for a wallet pass
post.description:
Create a notification for a wallet pass. The notification can be sent immediately or scheduled for a later time.

**Notification Status Options:**
- `Draft`: Notification created but not yet ready for delivery
- `Processing`: Notification will be sent immediately upon creation
- `Scheduled`: Notification will be sent at the specified scheduled time

**Scheduling:**
- For immediate delivery, use `Processing` status
- For scheduled delivery, use `Scheduled` status with a `scheduledTime`
- Scheduled notifications are processed every 15 minutes, so delivery may occur within 15 minutes of the scheduled time

parameters.name: x-workspace-id
parameters.description: Workspace ID to perform the operation in. If not provided, system will use the first one assigned to the user

requestBody.description: Notification creation data including pass reference, message content, and scheduling options

Create Notification Request.summary: Example wallet pass notification creation request for immediate delivery

value.notificationMessage: Your VIP membership benefits have been updated! Check out the new exclusive offers.
Your VIP membership benefits have been updated! Check out the new exclusive offers.

get.description:
Search and retrieve Wallet Pass Locations with optional filtering and pagination.

**Features:**
- Search locations by name using keyword query (case-insensitive)
- Filter by specific location ID or name
- Filter by wallet pass serial numbers
- Pagination support with cursor-based navigation

**Pagination:**
- Use `cursor` parameter for next page navigation
- `limit` controls page size (default: 20, max: 20)
- Response includes `items` array, `cursor`, and `hasMore` fields

parameters.name: cursor

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of locations to return per page (1-20, max 20)

parameters.name: passSerialNumbers
parameters.description: Filter locations by wallet pass serial numbers. Multiple values allowed.

parameters.name: id

Success Response.summary: Paginated list of wallet pass locations

get.summary: Get wallet pass notification by ID
get.description:
Retrieve a specific wallet pass notification by its unique identifier.
Optionally include notification statistics and click tracking data.

parameters.name: x-workspace-id
parameters.description: Workspace ID to perform the operation in. If not provided, system will use the first one assigned to the user

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the notification to retrieve

parameters.name: notificationStatsCursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor for fetching the next set of notification statistics records. Use the 'cursor' value from the previous response.

parameters.name: notificationStatsLimit
parameters.description: Number of notification statistics records to return per page (1-20, max 20)

parameters.name: includeStats
parameters.description: Include notification statistics and click tracking data

404.description: Not Found - Notification ID not found

value.notificationMessage: Your VIP membership benefits have been updated! Check out the new exclusive offers.

delete.description:
Delete wallet pass notification by ID. Only Draft or Scheduled notifications can be deleted.

**Deletion Rules:**
- `Draft` notifications can always be deleted
- `Scheduled` notifications can be deleted before they are processed
- `Processing`, `Published`, or `Failed` notifications cannot be deleted

parameters.name: x-workspace-id
parameters.description: Workspace ID to perform the operation in. If not provided, system will use the first one assigned to the user

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the notification to delete

404.description: Not Found - Notification ID not found

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid input or notification cannot be deleted

patch.description:
Update wallet pass notification. Only Draft or Scheduled notifications can be updated.

**Status Changes:**
- Change from `Draft` to `Processing` for immediate delivery
- Change from `Draft` to `Scheduled` for future delivery
- Update `Scheduled` notifications to change delivery time or content

**Scheduling Notes:**
- Scheduled notifications are processed every 15 minutes
- Delivery may occur within 15 minutes of the scheduled time
- Once a notification is `Processing` or `Published`, it cannot be updated

parameters.name: x-workspace-id
parameters.description: Workspace ID to perform the operation in. If not provided, system will use the first one assigned to the user

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the notification to update

requestBody.description: Updated notification data including message content and scheduling options

Update Notification Request.summary: Example wallet pass notification update request

value.notificationMessage: Your VIP membership benefits have been updated with new exclusive offers! Don't miss out on the latest deals.

404.description: Not Found - Notification ID not found

value.notificationMessage: Your VIP membership benefits have been updated with new exclusive offers! Don't miss out on the latest deals.

get.description:
Retrieve detailed statistics for a specific wallet pass notification including delivery metrics,
click tracking, and engagement data.

**Statistics Include:**
- Delivery status and timestamps
- Click-through rates for notification links
- User engagement metrics
- Error tracking and failure reasons

**Pagination:**
- Use `cursor` parameter for next page navigation
- `limit` controls page size (default: 20, max: 20)

parameters.name: x-workspace-id
parameters.description: Workspace ID to perform the operation in. If not provided, system will use the first one assigned to the user

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the notification to get statistics for

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor for fetching the next set of statistics records

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of statistics records to return per page (1-20, max 20)

404.description: Not Found - Notification ID not found

get.summary: Get a pre-signed URL to upload a file to S3
get.description: Get a pre-signed URL to upload a file to S3

Search and retrieve Pique Campaigns with optional filtering and pagination.

**Features:**
- Search campaigns by name using keyword query
- Filter by campaign status (Prepping, InProgress, Completed, Paused)
- Filter by campaign type (SocialPush, BrandDiscovery, SocialValidation, ConversionDriver, Enterprise, ViralBoost)
- Pagination support with cursor-based navigation
- Returns only published campaigns for branded users

**Pagination:**
- Use `cursor` parameter for next page navigation
- `limit` controls page size (default: 20)
- Response includes `items` array, `cursor`, and `hasMore` fields

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search keyword to filter campaigns by name (case-insensitive)

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor for fetching the next set of results. Use the 'cursor' value from the previous response.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of campaigns to return per page (1-20, max 20)

parameters.name: statusList
parameters.description: Filter campaigns by status. Multiple values allowed.

parameters.name: typeList
parameters.description: Filter campaigns by type. Multiple values allowed.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Filter by specific campaign ID

parameters.name: x-workspace-id
parameters.description: Workspace ID to perform the operation in. If not provided, system will use the first one assigned to the user

campaignData.rec1:
Campaign performed well with high engagement rates.
Health-focused creators are driving 34% higher engagement rates.
campaignData.rec2:
Consider partnering with more wellness influencers for upcoming campaigns.
TikTok content featuring 'morning routine' themes shows 28% better performance than Instagram.
campaignData.rec3: Optimize posting strategy around wellness routines.

createdTime.description: The time when the entity was created in ISO 8601 format including milliseconds and timezone offset.

updatedTime.description: The time when the entity was last updated in ISO 8601 format including milliseconds and timezone offset.

createdBy.description: The user who created the entity.

updatedBy.description: The user who last updated the entity.

workspaceId.description: The ID of the workspace to which this entity belongs.

name.description: Name of the location. This field is required and has a maximum length of 255 characters.

enabled.description: Indicates whether the location is enabled. If true, the pass may trigger a notification when the user is near this location. Default is true if not specified.

latitude.description: Latitude of the location in degrees. This field is required.

longitude.description: Longitude of the location in degrees. This field is required.

altitude.description: Altitude of the location in meters. Optional.

relevantText.description: Text to display on the lock screen when the user is near this location. This field is required and has a maximum length of 255 characters.

createdTime.description: The time when the entity was created in ISO 8601 format including milliseconds and timezone offset.

updatedTime.description: The time when the entity was last updated in ISO 8601 format including milliseconds and timezone offset.

createdBy.description: The user who created the entity.

updatedBy.description: The user who last updated the entity.

workspaceId.description: The ID of the workspace to which this entity belongs.

Account.description: Account which the pass belongs to. If it's not provided the system will automatically use the default account for the workspace.

description.description: Pass description. Apple: Displayed on the back of the pass, providing additional details. Google: Used as the main description of the pass, visible in the pass details.

organizationName.description: Organization name. Apple: Displayed on the lock screen and in the Wallet app, identifying the issuer. Google: Displayed at the top of the pass, identifying the issuer.

qrUrl.description: URL or text for the QR code.

qrText.description: QR text. It appears below the QR code.

locations.description: Locations. Apple: Defines geographic locations where the pass is relevant. The pass can appear on the lock screen when the user is near one of these locations. Google: Not supported.

fileName.description: The name of the pass image file, this is required when creating a wallet pass

uploadKey.description: The upload key of the image. This required when creating a wallet pass.

url.description: The URL of the uploaded image. Will be retrieved in GET operations.

UploadInfo.description: Wallet pass images. each pass has to have a logo, icon, and strip images in png format. footer.png is optional.

appType.description: Type of application for the deep link

inputLink.description: The input link URL for the deep link

appleAppStoreUrl.description: Apple App Store URL (for Mobile App type)

googlePlayStoreUrl.description: Google Play Store URL (for Mobile App type)

UserDeepLink.description: User deep link configuration containing app type and input link

createdTime.description: The time when the entity was created in ISO 8601 format including milliseconds and timezone offset.

updatedTime.description: The time when the entity was last updated in ISO 8601 format including milliseconds and timezone offset.

createdBy.description: The user who created the entity.

updatedBy.description: The user who last updated the entity.

passName.description: Name of the pass, the name has to be unique within the workspace.

uploadInfoList.description: Wallet pass images. each pass has to have a logo, icon, and strip images in png format. footer.png is optional.

passLink.description: The link where passes can be downloaded. This link will be generated after passes are created.

notificationHeader.description: This is used for Apple passes. The notification header is displayed on the lock screen when a notification is sent to the pass.

appleIssuedCount.description: Total number of users who have added this pass to their Apple Wallets

googleIssuedCount.description: Total number of users who have added this pass to their Google Wallets

totalIssuedCount.description: Total number of users who have added this pass to their wallets (Apple + Google)

appleActiveCount.description: Total number of users who have added this pass to their Apple Wallets and have not removed it

googleActiveCount.description: Total number of users who have added this pass to their Google Wallets and have not removed it

totalActiveCount.description: Total number of users who have added this pass to their wallets (Apple + Google) and have not removed it

passLinkSlug.description: Slug to be used for the pass link. This is used to generate the pass link, if not provided the system will generate a random slug.

googlePassLink.description: Raw link to Google Pass. This link is provided by Google API.

createdTime.description: The time when the entity was created in ISO 8601 format including milliseconds and timezone offset.

updatedTime.description: The time when the entity was last updated in ISO 8601 format including milliseconds and timezone offset.

createdBy.description: The user who created the entity.

updatedBy.description: The user who last updated the entity.

workspaceId.description: The ID of the workspace to which this entity belongs.

createdTime.description: The time when the entity was created in ISO 8601 format including milliseconds and timezone offset.

updatedTime.description: The time when the entity was last updated in ISO 8601 format including milliseconds and timezone offset.

createdBy.description: The user who created the entity.

updatedBy.description: The user who last updated the entity.

workspaceId.description: workspace id to which the notification belongs.

passSerialNumber.description: Wallet pass id to which the notification belongs.

notificationName.description: Notification name. This is will not appear on pass, it's used internally to identify the notification.

notificationMessage.description: Notification message. For Apple passes, this message will be displayed on the lock screen when a notification is sent to the pass. For Google passes, this message will be displayed at the back of the pass when a notification is sent to the pass.

status.description: Notification status: Draft: Notification will not be sent until the status is changed to Scheduled or ProcessingScheduled: Notification is scheduled to be sent at a specific time. Processing: Notification is being sent. Published: Notification has been sent.Failed: Notification failed to be sent. If the status is not specified at the time of creation, it will be sent immediately.

publishedTime.description: Time when the notification was sent in ISO 8601 format including milliseconds and timezone offset.

scheduledTime.description: Time when the notification will be sent in ISO 8601 format including milliseconds and timezone offset.

appleNotificationSentCount.description: Number of active users who have received this notification on their Apple Wallets.

googleNotificationSentCount.description: Number of active users who have received this notification on their Google Wallets.

totalNotificationSentCount.description: Total number of active users who have received this notification on their wallets (Apple + Google).
